Text: Program works, but crashes if there is too much music in the database, in meaning... say like over 500 files or more, it will crash.
Correction after a certain amount maybe or something else, it will crashed, i had over 2000 songs in one folder, and it crashes, but anything below 1000 and it might be stable enough.
